channel.title: LCallDR

item.description: President Biden on Friday said he will grant the Trump campaign the extra security is it requesting as he continues to campaign for the presidency.

item.description: Hurricanes Helene and Milton have impacted more Donald Trump voters than Kamala Harris voters, political analyst Mark Halperin told Newsmax on Friday.

item.title: 'We believe in Donald Trump': More than a dozen Medal of Honor recipients endorse former president
item.description: More than a dozen Congressional Medal of Honor recipients endorsed former President Trump in the 2024 presidential race.
